title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 27.5 - Size of containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 27.5 - Size of containers

State Regulations

No holder of an IAP permit shall purchase or keep upon
his premises any alcohol, except in the original containers as received from
the distributor, in such size as specified in said permit provided however, that the State Liquor Authority may grant to the holder of an IAP permit, permission to purchase alcohol in original containers of a size other than that
specified in said permit, upon proper proof being submitted showing the
necessity for the purchase of alcohol in such containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
27.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
